org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.file.impl
Class BaseFileTaskBroker

java.lang.Object
  org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.task.impl.AbstractTaskSubmissionService
      org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.task.impl.SimpleTaskSubmissionBroker
          org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.file.impl.BaseFileTaskBroker
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileTaskService, org.gridlab.gridsphere.portlet.service.PortletService, org.gridlab.gridsphere.portlet.service.spi.PortletServiceProvider, TaskSubmissionService
public class BaseFileTaskBroker
extends SimpleTaskSubmissionBroker
implements FileTaskService

Implements the file task service as a "broker" for other file task services. This service will invoke the appropriate file task service depending upon the type of file tasks passed to its methods.
